category: news
title: "Financial services firms risk missing out on $2.7 trillion in value add from use of trusted AI: Temasek report"
excerpt: "SINGAPORE - While ethical artificial intelligence (AI) and analytics adoption can add about US$2 trillion ($2.7 trillion) of value each year to the global banking and insurance industry, a Temasek survey of financial firms in select markets including Singapore showed that only 13 per cent of them use AI solutions across the bulk of their processes."
